doc.title: Herders' Calling
doc.plot: In the beautiful rolling foothills of the Kyrgyz Republic, Central Asia, a young woman prepares to leave behind a way of life thousands of years old. Herding animals has long been the daily reality, but for 22-year-old Nazgul, the city is calling. Through the eyes of Akim Aliev Datka, a pensioner who's returned to his family land, and Nazgul, his modern daughter-in-law who struggles with tradition and thoughts of the future, Herders' Calling offers the viewer a glimpse into their unique world in this expansive, isolated land.
